comment:
Optimization:The process of finding the best solution among a set of feasible options to minimize or maximize a certain objective function.
Constraint:A condition that must be satisfied in order to meet the requirements of the problem, such as the limitation on the number of bus trips in this case.
Heuristic:A problem-solving approach that uses practical methods to find approximate solutions when an exact solution is impractical or too time-consuming to compute.
